name: A Guy With A Book Fighting Monsters
name_original: A Guy With A Book Fighting Monsters
description:
A simple game made in a week with the goal of understanding LÖVE.

I'm too lazy to check whether the game runs fine/is balanced/etc. There might not be updates (unless the game literally crashes every time or something).

How To Play

  • W, A, S, D - Move
  • Up, Left, Down, Right - Shoot
  • Space - Bomb
  • Escape - Exit Game
